text: Patricia B. Hurley (born December 29, 1939) is a Republican member of the North Carolina General Assembly. She represents the 70th district. ==Career== In 2016, Hurley was reelected to her seat representing the 70th District. ==References== Category:Living people Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:Women state legislators in North Carolina Category:21st-century American politicians Category:1939 births Category:21st-century American women politicians
title: Pat Hurley
